_comment: Demo data profile for KoNote. Place alongside your setup_config.json. Programs not listed here will get auto-generated demo data.
description: Example demo data profile — customise for your agency

note_text_pool: Session focused on coping strategies. Youth identified three new grounding techniques they want to try this week.
Reviewed safety plan together. Youth reports feeling safer this week than last. Good eye contact throughout.
Discussed relationship patterns. Youth made a connection between past experiences and current reactions. Important insight.
Check-in session. Youth reported a tough week at school but used breathing exercises we practised. Celebrated this.
Worked on identifying triggers. Youth was able to name three situations that increase anxiety. Progress.
Art-based session today. Youth expressed feelings through drawing that they couldn't verbalise. Very powerful.
Goal review. Youth met two of three weekly goals. Discussed what helped and what got in the way.
Family dynamics came up today. Youth is navigating a complicated relationship with a parent. Offered support.
client_words_pool: I almost didn't come today but I'm glad I did
The breathing thing actually helped when I got anxious at school
I don't know why I get so angry sometimes — I want to figure that out
I told my mum about what we talked about and she actually listened
I feel like I'm starting to understand myself better
Today was hard but I stayed the whole time which is new for me
I want to keep coming even when it's difficult
Something is different — I feel like I can actually handle things now
suggestions_pool: It would help to have a quiet room for sessions — the main area is too noisy
More group activities for teens would be nice
I wish there was someone to talk to on weekends when things get hard
Having a text line would be easier than calling when I'm in crisis

suggestion_themes.name: Access to quiet spaces
suggestion_themes.description: Youth have requested quieter spaces for one-on-one sessions away from group areas.

suggestion_themes.name: Weekend support availability
suggestion_themes.description: Several youth have expressed need for support outside regular business hours.

client_personas.goal_statement: I want to manage my anxiety without always needing someone else to help me.
I want to stop feeling so angry all the time.
I want to feel safe enough to go to school every day.

note_text_pool: Apartment search session. Reviewed three listings together. Client identified one within budget near transit.
Budgeting session. Mapped monthly income against expenses. Found $120 in savings by switching phone plan.
Landlord communication support. Coached client through a difficult conversation about repairs. Went well.
Monthly check-in. Housing situation is stable. Client reports feeling more settled than last month.
Discussed tenant rights. Reviewed what landlords can and cannot do regarding inspections and rent increases.
Crisis follow-up. Client received a notice about rent increase. Connected with legal aid for advice.
Goal review. Income has stabilised. Client is now looking at longer-term housing options.
Joint session with income support worker. Explored additional benefits client may be eligible for.
client_words_pool: I just need a place that feels like mine
The budget thing helped — I didn't realise how much I was spending on delivery
I'm scared of losing this place too
It's the first time in a long time I feel like things might be okay
I wish the landlord would just fix the heating
Having someone help me through the paperwork made all the difference

client_personas.goal_statement: I need a place that feels safe — not just a roof.
I don't want to lose my apartment.
I just want things to stop being so unpredictable.
